RecordDaily: Record daily water intake and track
Information: V is the volume of the water norm in liters per day, M is your body weight, T is the time of active sports, or another type of activity commensurate in terms of loads (in the absence of these, you must set 0)
TimeOfActive: The time of active participation in sports:
RequiredAmount: The required amount of water in liters per day:
WriteDown: Write down how much water you will drink:
EditAmount: Edit the entered amount of water
ValueOfWater: Enter the value of the water used:
YouSure: Are you sure you want to delete the entry?
WannaLeave: Do you really want to leave?
ShowDays: Show days not as in week
SetSunday: Set Sunday as the first day of the week
